content:
You're in luck! There are many online stores that offer a wide selection of modern decorations at affordable prices. Here are some popular options:

1. **Wayfair**: Wayfair is one of the largest online furniture and home goods stores, offering a vast selection of modern decorations at discounted prices. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on a wide range of decorative items.
2. **Amazon**: Amazon is a great resource for modern decorations, with a vast selection of products from various brands and sellers. You can read reviews, compare prices, and often find great deals on decorative items.
3. **West Elm**: West Elm is a popular home decor brand that offers a wide range of modern decorations, including vases, sculptures, and wall art. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on stylish decorative items.
4. **AllModern**: AllModern is an online store that specializes in modern furniture and decor. They offer a wide selection of decorative items, including vases, sculptures, and wall art, at affordable prices.
5. **CB2**: CB2 is a modern home decor brand that offers a wide range of affordable decorative items, including vases, candles, and wall art. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on stylish decorative items.
6. **Target**: Target is a great resource for affordable modern decorations, including vases, sculptures, and wall art. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on decorative items.
7. **Overstock**: Overstock is an online store that offers a wide range of decorative items, including vases, sculptures, and wall art, at discounted prices. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on decorative items.
8. **Etsy**: Etsy is an online marketplace where you can find unique, handmade decorative items from independent sellers. You can find one-of-a-kind decorative pieces at affordable prices.
9. **Joss & Main**: Joss & Main is an online store that offers a wide range of modern decorative items, including vases, sculptures, and wall art, at affordable prices. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on stylish decorative items.
10. **Birch Lane**: Birch Lane is an online store that offers a wide range of modern decorative items, including vases, sculptures, and wall art, at affordable prices. They often have sales and discounts, and you can find great deals on decorative items.

These online stores offer a wide selection of modern decorations at affordable prices. Be sure to read reviews, check prices, and look for sales and discounts to find the best deals. Happy shopping!
